description: Generates a prompt template that instructs Codex/Claude agents to produce ordered checklists for AI Task Monitor work items.

summary.purpose: Blueprint describing how to emit structured checklist prompts with placeholder substitution.

placeholders.name: task_id
placeholders.description: Active task identifier such as TASK_006_structured_prompt_generators

placeholders.name: task_title
placeholders.description: Human readable title for the task or deliverable

placeholders.name: acceptance_criteria
placeholders.description: Semicolon-separated acceptance criteria or success checks
placeholders.example: CLI writes prompt;Backend exposes API;Tests cover blueprint errors

placeholders.name: context
placeholders.description: Key background notes (files to inspect, risks, references)

template.body: You are the AI Task Monitor assistant. For task {{task_title}} ({{task_id}}) craft an ordered checklist with explicit validation notes. Reference acceptance criteria: {{acceptance_criteria}}. Context: {{context}}. Output Markdown list items that begin with `- [ ]` and include short rationale statements.
